question: Which state bagged the 'State of the Year' Award under the 'business leader" category as part of the India Business Leadership recently?
explanation: Chhattisgarh bagged the 'State of the Year' Award under the 'business leader" category as part of the India Business Leadership for the increase in business and services activities. Union Information Technology and Electronics Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad gave the award at India Business Leader Awards. Chhattisgarh has been ranked 4th in World Bank's list of 'Ease of Doing Business'.
